plot: Short documentary about Santiago Rusiñol, Spanish painter and writer, showing also the city of Sitges and the Rusiñol museum.
title: El rincón de Rusiñol
plot_es: Short documentary about Santiago Rusiñol, Spanish painter and writer, showing also the city of Sitges and the Rusiñol museum.
plot_en: Short documentary about Santiago Rusiñol, Spanish painter and writer, showing also the city of Sitges and the Rusiñol museum.
